name: Rakan
title: The Charmer
shortBio: As mercurial as he is charming, Rakan is an infamous vastayan troublemaker and the greatest battle-dancer in Lhotlan tribal history. To the humans of the Ionian highlands, his name has long been synonymous with wild festivals, uncontrollable parties, and anarchic music. Few would suspect this energetic, traveling showman is also partner to the rebel Xayah, and is dedicated to her cause.

skins.name: Cosmic Dawn Rakan
skins.description: Dawn chases dusk beneath the sea, two lovers locked in an endless waltz across the stars. Thus Rakan is never far behind Xayah, his breaking light glowing always above her shadow.

skins.name: Sweetheart Rakan
skins.description: Love is in the air, and this time Rakan has a plan. He swears, this time, it will definitely, almost absolutely certainly happen. He's thought about every poetic phrase, every dreamy dance moveâ€”but still, he can't decide on what the perfect gift would be: chocolates, or flowers?

skins.name: SSG Rakan
skins.description: Honoring CoreJJ's winning performance as Rakan during the 2017 World Championship.

skins.name: iG Rakan
skins.description: Honoring Baolan's winning performance as Rakan during the 2018 World Championship.

skins.name: Star Guardian Rakan

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: Many years ago, Rakan was destroyed in the fight against Zoe, alongside his lover Xayah. The pair were then resurrected and turned against their allies -- a fact Rakan seems keenly aware of. Biding his time to strike, he has a plan to purify the darkness from Xayah's heart... though the price may be losing himself to evil forever.

skins.name: Elderwood Rakan

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Battle Queens event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Deep in the shaded canopies of the Elderwood, the Fey Prince Rakan and Princess Xayah hold court over two rival fairy dominions. Star-crossed lovers uninterested in the affairs of mortals, their playful romance has insulated their people from the horrors befalling the outside world.

skins.name: Arcana Rakan

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: One half of a perpetually incomplete whole, Rakan's fated love was not in the Lower World, but among the Higher Arcana far above. As the two rush to meet betwixt the lands of their birth, fate bubbles and boils overâ€”a roiling sea from which a new order may emerge.

skins.name: Broken Covenant Rakan

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: Rakan's mouth always got him into trouble, and after getting caught stealing from Vladimir and nearly killed, he awoke to find himself a newly turned Neverghaast, thanks to his beloved Xayah. In the time they've been separated while she repays his debt, Rakan can feel his thirsts grow and dreads showing his partner the monster he fears he's becoming.

skins.name: Redeemed Star Guardian Rakan
skins.description: The darkness never suited Rakanâ€”the First Star's light complements the glossy shine of his hair more than any chaos magic could. Plus, making evil plans is not really his style. A guardian once more, Rakan can now enjoy a welcome respite and perhaps a dance or two with Xayah.

skins.name: Dragonmancer Rakan

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: Rakan wished to fight by his beloved Xayah's side, vowing to be her worthy equal after she gained the fenghuang's blessing. This vow took him inward, to a landscape of his nightmares, to confront his fears given form. Unflinching in battles of the mind and body, guarding the purity of his heart and love, Rakan earned the grace of the Devotion Dragon.

skins.name: Prestige Dragonmancer Rakan
skins.description: The dragon-blessed Rakan sports clean-cut scale textures and sharp selections of armor to highlight his best angles. His charm shines through the elegant, organic swoops of his form-fitting wearâ€”and his devotion to the runway is unbeatable.

spells.name: Gleaming Quill
spells.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Rakan flings a magical feather that deals @TotalDamage@ magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the feather hits a champion or epic jungle monster, Rakan restores @TotalHeal@ Health to himself and nearby allies after @HealDelay@ seconds or when he touches an allied champion.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Grand Entrance
spells.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
spells.dynamicDescription: Rakan dashes, then spirals into the air, <status>Knocking Up</status> for @KnockupDuration@ second and dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Battle Dance
spells.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Rakan dashes to an allied champion, granting them @TotalShield@ Shield for @Effect3Amount@ seconds.

Rakan can Recast this Ability once within @Effect2Amount@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: The Quickness
spells.description: Gains Move Speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
spells.dynamicDescription: Rakan gains <speed>@Effect5Amount@% Move Speed</speed> for @Effect2Amount@ seconds. Rakan deals <magicDamage>@TotalDamageTooltip@ magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Charms</status> enemies for @Effect3Amount@ second(s) the first time he touches them. The first champion touched grants Rakan <speed>@Effect6Amount@% decaying Move Speed</speed>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
